TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit MMC_LISTPAD_INFO extends System.ValueType

summary.span: 由 方法來填入，以指定清單檢視工作台的標題文字、選擇性按鈕文字，以及選擇性按鈕命令識別。

span.span: Filled by the method to specify the title text, optional button text, and optional button command identification for a list-view task pad.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需使用 MMC 程式設計\_LISTPAD\_資訊結構和 Microsoft Management Console (MMC)，請參閱[MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview)。For more information about programming with the MMC\_LISTPAD\_INFO structure and the Microsoft Management Console (MMC), see the [MMC Programmer's Guide](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/windows/desktop/mmc/mmc-programmer-s-guide-overview).
